title: On the supremum of the sets of copulas with given curvilinear section
authors: Yao Ouyang, Yonghui Sun, Hua-Peng Zhang
abstract:
By employing the total variation of certain functions, we give an explicit
formula for the supremum of the set of all copulas with a given curvilinear
section. This supremum being a copula is characterized and the relationship
between this supremum and that of the set of all quasi-copulas with the same
curvilinear section is considered.
